titleStmt.title: Christs birth misse-timed. Or, A resolution to a question about the time of Christs nativity; evidencing by Scripture, that Jesus Christ was not born in December. By R.S.
titleStmt.author: Skinner, Robert, 1591-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Bartlet, at the sign of the Gilt Cup at Austins Gate, neer the Stump,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
